page.title: 17FARM MACHINERY IN SAMPFORD
page.content: {THE MACHINE YEAR cont'd A{sprayer}is carried by a tractor, sprays water and chemicals on the growing crops to kill the weeds. A{nodet}is carried by a tractor and can be used to sow seed,but more often is used for top dressing and putting fertilizer on the growing crops. {Trailers}are used for carrying heavy goods or the crop after it has been harvested. {Sugar beet machines}are rarely used by farmers as the refinery at Felstead has closed down. {Sugar beet harvesters}lift the ripe sugar beet,cuts the leaves off and throws the beet into a trailer.
